title: Understanding Formula Checkers
text: A formula checker is a tool that helps ensure the accuracy and logic of formulas in a workbook. It functions similarly to a spell checker in a word processor.

title: Purpose of a Formula Checker
text: The main purpose of a formula checker is to verify that the formulas used in a workbook are logical and make sense, preventing errors in calculations.

hintAnswer: similar to a spell checker, it makes sure formulas in a workbook make sense
title: Choosing the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes the function of a formula checker?
choices: similar to a spell checker, it makes sure formulas in a workbook make sense
similar to a spell checker, it makes sure formulas are known
it changes the formulas to make sure they are correct
